name: MEM (massimomann)
description:
Platformer game realized with the help of 7 kids  aging between 5 and 11, contributing with their drawings as well as their ideas.

Our mind is tailored to understand the world we have around. It works using quantum mechanics (QM)  as well as cooperative  phenomena. What happens if things do not follow the rules of physics? In the second level  we reverse the arrow of time,   QM still works, could our mind understand the reversed world we have around?  Do our dresses reverse their color?

Special thanks to 

Benedetta, Dario, Flora, Leonardo, Marina, Olivia and Valentina
